articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: IND vs PAK, Asia Cup Super Four: Will rain force another washout on reserve day? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rain was already anticipated to disrupt the proceedings on Sunday but surprisingly the match kicked-off in bright and sunny conditions. | Cricket
articles.content: Rain has been a big factor in the ongoing Asia Cup with almost every match, which is being played in Sri Lanka getting affected due to it. However, it is India and Pakistan, who seems to be the most … [+2180 chars]
